title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Task-Oriented Project-Based Learning for Shifting Mathematical Discourse

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can recognize and explain discursive conflicts arising in integer multiplication scenarios (negative × positive)
Learners can experience interactions between existing and new mathematical discourses through task situation design
Learners can spontaneously explore and apply new mathematical rules (e.g., negative number operations) during project work

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
